actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to provide for reports on the employment impact of legislation significantly affecting the multiple-use status of public lands and resources.

summary.text: Directs the committees of either House of Congress to include in their reports on bills and resolutions on the multiple-use status of public lands or resources statements on: (1) the immediate impact on current governmental and private employment directly attributable to the proposed legislation; (2) the long-term economic effects of the proposed legislation; and (3) the type of employment opportunities and possible economic effects of the proposed legislation.

titles.title: A bill to provide for reports on the employment impact of legislation significantly affecting the multiple-use status of public lands and resources.
